body.paragraph: This is paragraph one. "Baby steps to giant strides!", he said. Contiguous lines are concatenated. into one paragraph. So, you can fold them by a single linefeed.
I replied, "This is the second paragraph. I'm not sure though." Brank lines separate paragraphs.

body.macro: comment Macros are not translated but kept intact to the output.

body.blockquote: Lines in blockquotes are also concatenated and translated. A whitespace must follow ">".

body.list: Hop. Step. Jump! Each item in the list are not segmented.
Saitama, Saitama? A whitespace must follow "-".

body.code:
one
two two

three three three
